name: Alk'oth: The Lost Fortress of Doom
name_original: Alk'oth: The Lost Fortress of Doom
description:
Many have whispered of the last resting place of the sorcerer Idultar, but none have found it. Until now. You hold fast to your courage and prepare to enter the fortress. The sorcerer's staff, used long ago to allow man to step through the firmament, lies buried somewhere inside.

Alk'oth is a traditional roguelike in the vein of games like Moria and Larn. The game runs in the terminal, so you can adjust the font size and colors to your liking. Please feel free to share any feedback you might have.  Enjoy!

C++ / pdcurses
